EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Incomplete Registrations 6-23-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Your SpringOne Platform 2017 registration is still incomplete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You're receiving this email because you started, but didn't finish the process of ordering a pass for SpringOne Platform 2017 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>. There's still time to save $400 off a full SpringOne Platform pass if you finalize your registration by Saturday, June 24th at 11:59 pm PDT. Click here <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration]]> to head back to the event page to complete registration.
Are you having trouble resolving an issue with registration? Please email us at platform@pivotal.io <[[mailto:platform@pivotal.io]]> and we will get back to you ASAP.
We look forward to seeing you in person! Kathryn Efird from The SpringOne Platform Team
